Scbbb changes have been cade this year la the IER3? schedule which result in a shortened

Ohe IER3? will get underway on Wednesday, toy 2, with a reception et 5:30 p.m. Ohe
opening general session will he that evening at 8:CO p.m.
Therefore, we would like to schedule the meeting of the full board for 11:30 a.m. to

We will begin to put together the Board agenda within e few weeks. Therefore, -we would
appreciate it if you would send any suggested agenda items to me not later than April
1, together with any background information you feel should be included in the prepared
material.
Meetings of the Radio and TV Board will, of course, be called by the ebairaaea of same,
if they desire, and they will prepare any inform! agendas to be used. Therefore, if
you have suggestions for items to be considered by the separate Boards, perhaps you
could send them to either Hurlbert or Khger.
To recap:

May 2.
